tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE legislative_records (
    record_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    document_title STRING,
    document_type STRING,
    author_name STRING,
    date_created TIMESTAMP,
    voting_data JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE legislative_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  record_title VARCHAR(255),
  record_date DATE,
  author_id INT,
  votes_received INT
);

CREATE TABLE voting_data (
  vote_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  voter_id INT,
  record_id INT,
  vote_choice ENUM('yes', 'no', 'abstain'),
  vote_date DATETIME
);

CREATE TABLE VotingRecords (
  voting_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  record_id UUID,
  legislator_id UUID,
  vote_decision TEXT,
  vote_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE LegislativeCouncil (
    council_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    council_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    session_dates DATE[],
    council_members INT
)

CREATE TABLE Legislation (
    bill_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    bill_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    bill_text TEXT,
    sponsor_id UUID REFERENCES LegislativeCouncil(council_id),
    proposed_date DATE,
    status TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Votes (
    vote_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    bill_id UUID REFERENCES Legislation(bill_id),
    voter_id UUID REFERENCES LegislativeCouncil(council_id),
    vote_date DATE,
    decision TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Committees (
    committee_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    committee_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    chair_id UUID REFERENCES LegislativeCouncil(council_id),
    committee_members INT[],
    meeting_dates DATE[]
)

CREATE TABLE MeetingMinutes (
    minutes_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    meeting_date DATE,
    committee_id UUID REFERENCES Committees(committee_id),
    minutes_text TEXT
)
